definitions.definition: The state or quality of being active; activeness.
definitions.example: Pit row was abuzz with activity.

definitions.definition: Something done as an action or a movement.
definitions.example: The activity for the morning was a walk to the store.

definitions.definition: Something done for pleasure or entertainment, especially one involving movement or an excursion.
definitions.example: An increasing number of sports activities are on offer at the university.

definitions.definition: (grammar) The lexical aspect (aktionsart) of verbs or predicates that change over time and have no natural end point.
